feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fix redirect back after adding a channel
New release for Postiz: Disable image compression
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feat/PR Docker Images by @egelhaus in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/745
  • Disable image compression variable by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/750

Image compression

With DISABLE_IMAGE_COMPRESSION=true you can diable the image compression for postiz.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.43.4...v1.43.5

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Dub SelfHost support and Mastodon custom URL support
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(short-linking): make Dub provider configurable for self-hosting by @eddywashere in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/751
  • feat: Move https://mastodon.social to env variable for ability to chaâ€¦ by @halkeye in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/708

New Contributors

  • @eddywashere made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/751
  • @halkeye made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/708

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.43.5...v1.44.1

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Added instagram standalone and threads a refresh token mechanism
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Instagram standalone insights by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/754
  • Threads refresh token by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/758

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.44.1...v1.44.2

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Multi Language Support
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added multi-language option by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/770

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.44.2...v1.45.1
